ygData.subject: Other Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, well too late for me know, I lost the potion in one of my early deaths, No matter. Does anyone know of any other quests? Esp. for a 7 lvl Pal?
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, well too late for me know, I lost the potion in one of my early
deaths, No matter. Does anyone know of any other quests? Esp. for a 7 lvl
Pal?


On Mon, 19 Apr 1999, Ragnarok wrote:

> From: "Ragnarok" <gvragnarok@...>
>
> Yeah, when you get to the last (7th?) person, Sentry Warren I think will
> tell you you will be looking for Guard Xyrin, and she's not on these lands.
> You find out she's in the Ocean of Tears and it goes from there.
>
> Waiting for the boat makes this quest seem not worth it, but it depends on
> what one gets out of it. =)
>
> Tiresias
> Servant of Erollisi Marr
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Ryan <rwp3@...>
> To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 12:59 PM
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Guard Xyrin and the Quest of Something or Another
>
>
> > From: Ryan <rwp3@...>
> >
> > I started it but I never finished it. By the way, I should introduce
> > myself as well. I'm Reppik on Bertoxxulous. I too am serving Erollisi Marr
> > and can usually be found in and around Freeport. I'm only Lvl 7 at the
> > moment however.
> > As to the quest, I didn't even know that the quest took you out of
> > Freeport. I had to give up because I couldn't find anyone that would even
> > tell me about Xyrin.
> >
> >
> > On Mon, 19 Apr 1999, Ragnarok wrote:
> >
> > > I'd like to introduce myself. My character rather. The name is
> Tiresias,
> > > and right now he's a level 14 Paladin on the Povar server. You know...
> > > Povar... You never heard of Povar?! =) He serves Erollisi Marr 24/7. I
> > > usually hangs around Freeport area... the commonlands, Desert of Ro, and
> > > Befallen, smiting evil and whatnot. In any case...
> > >
> > > I was wondering if anyone did the quest to look for the last Guard Xyrin
> in
> > > the quest that starts in the Temple of Marr. Is that a beginner's quest
> or
> > > what? Because I got as far as the isle in the Ocean of Tears talking to
> all
> > > the Holy Woman O' Fun and I hear a scream come out of nowhere yearning
> for
> > > help, but I can't find where it's coming from! The nearest islands have
> > > goblins I'm not sure I want to mess with... anybody do this one yet?
> > >
> > > -Tiresias
> > > Servant of Erollsi
> > >
> >
> >

> > to digest, go to the ONElist web site, at http://www.onelist.com and
> > select the Member Center link from the menu bar on the left.
> >
